name: MLWordTaggerMetrics
desc: Metrics you use to evaluate a word tagger’s performance.

items.name: var taggingError: Double
items.desc: The fraction of incorrectly tagged examples.

items.name: var precisionRecall: MLDataTable
items.desc: A data table listing the precision and recall percentages for each category.

items.name: var confusion: MLDataTable
items.desc: A table comparing the actual and predicted labels for each tagging category.

items.name: var isValid: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the metrics were calculated.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The underlying error present when the metrics are invalid.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the word tagger metrics.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the word tagger metrics that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the word tagger metrics shown in a playground.
